desc: 55% all parameters (Light), spark damage fills BB gauge and restores HP, 100% Light elemental damage & 50-75% damage counter
lore:
A pair of lightsteel knuckle dusters with laser spurs belonging to Kelsa, rising star of the underground circuit. Sent to the earthly realm in a competition to become Emperor Yu's assistant, Rooster has a vastly different idea for her "skillset."

Less interested in the position of assistant than a means of humbling ne'er-do-wells, Rooster's wanderings soon brought her to the underground fighting circuit. Every spin, every jump, and every kick in her new human form was no less deadly than she was before; she simply needed new talons.
name: Rooster's Flair
